name: Garcia Walbaum St Jude
description: Hola! Como familia estamos juntando dinero para apoyar la honrosa causa de St Jude Reaserch Hospital. St Jude es un hospital ubicado en Memphis que hace investigación para curar el Cancer de niños menores de 14 años. Desde 1962 han puesto a disposición toda su investigación para avanzar. Además, es un hospital que recibe a niños de todo el mundo y les da tratamiento SIN COSTO incluyendo la vida de la familia en esta ciudad. Mas en https://www.stjude.org

name: End Childhood Cancer
description: For my 30th birthday, I'm fundraising for St. Jude Children's Research Hospital, which is working to defeat childhood cancer and other life-threatening diseases. Join me and Relay FM supporting their incredible cause and become one of the countless donors helping families at St. Jude. If you did not know, any family whose child receives care at St. Jude never gets a bill, which includes their housing and no matter the cost of care. Be a champion for good and consider donating today.

name: Relay FM for St. Jude 2023
description: For every parent, the ultimate horror is that their own child becomes seriously ill. No family in the world should suffer such a fate. That's why I would like to support the fundraising campaign of the podcast network Relay FM for the St. Jude Children's Research Hospital. Children with cancer from all over the world are treated there free of charge. In addition, St. Jude has been researching better cures for decades. I can hardly think of anything more worthy of support.

name: Domain Name Relief
description: If you're anything like me, you've gathered up quite the collection of registered domain names over the years. Some for side-projects that never materialised, some for specific in-jokes and maybe some just for the heck of it. It can be hard to let go of those names, especially the side-projects. And that's okay. You can keep them. All I ask that in return, you donate an amount (I recommend $5) per domain name you have registered to help kids with cancer, reduce suffering and find cures.

name: Jill hearts Relay FM
description:
Relay FM is my favorite event to work on each year. In addition to helping to plan and produce the events, I'm pitching in to do my part by starting my own fundraiser to help the event reach its goals. 

It started as a humble little livestream with a child-size ballpit and a fundraising goal of $75,000 in 2019. Since then, we've raised $2.2M and are planning a wild and weird 12 hour livestream with 3 distinct sets on 9/22. 

If you have the means to support this campaign, I'd be so grateful!

More details at: https://oliveoctopus.ink/stjude.htm

I'm joining the Relay FM community to support St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital! name: Alex Cox Hates Cancer
description:
I just turned 33, and what I want for my birthday is for no kid or their families to go into a lifetime of medical debt paying for cancer treatments. Good thing St. Jude is working to make that a reality!

Once again Relay FM and friends are coming together to support St. Jude Children's Research Hospital. Our donations go to cutting-edge research that saves lives and ensures that families never receive a bill from St. Jude for treatment, travel, housing, or food!

name: Aaron's St. Jude Fundraiser 2023
description: Hey everyone! My absolute favorite podcast network, RelayFM, is doing their annual fundraiser for St. Jude Children's Hospital and this year I'm helping them raise money! St. Jude is a really unique place in that not only do they treat children with cancer, but they also do not require a single penny from the families of the children. They are only able to do that because of the donations of people like you. They also share much of their cancer research across the globe. Thank you for donating!

name: Nic Lake for St. Jude 2023
description:
Join me as I help the Relay FM Podcast Network raise money for St. Jude! The cause is extra important to me now that I have an 18 month old daughter in my life; I couldn't imagine having to go through something like your child having cancer, and not having any support.

I will be matching every donation up to the $250 goal - let's raise some money for a great cause!

name: Support the Research of Relay FM’s Official Historian 📜
description:
I spend a lot of time researching/making spreadsheets about Relay FM, especially in the run up to the Podcastathon! This year I’m tracking the time I spend researching for the co-founders quiz, announcing the total number of hours afterwards. 

If you want to show your appreciation of my research or spreadsheets, why not donate an amount based on those hours? If you don’t want to wait that long, or want to show your support for my art or other work over years, feel free to donate for that too!

name: The Marco Offset
description:
I'm fundraising for St. Jude's Research Hospital as a sub-campaign of Relay's campaign. The theme of this fundraiser is for people to donate the amount of their 'The Marco Offset'. 

'The Marco Offset' is a way of calculating a donation amount based on how much extra you are paying for a new iPhone off the base price is how much you should also donate to St. Jude's. This process was discussed on Accidental Tech Podcast Episode 551.

You can calculate your amount on themarcooffset.com

name: Remedia Liberis
description: This fundraiser is for St. Jude Children's Research Hospital and to support their work in researching childhood cancer, providing care to children and families in need, and sharing their findings to aid the global fight against pediatric cancer.

rewards.name: No More Chemo Party
rewards.description: Your donation could help provide a No More Chemo Party to St. Jude patients and families as a fun way to celebrate the end of chemotherapy.

rewards.name: Art Supplies
rewards.description: Your donation could help provide art supplies to St. Jude patients who use these supplies to explore their creativity, express themselves and just have fun!

rewards.name: Red Wagon
rewards.description: Your donation could help provide red wagons to St. Jude patients. Red wagons are the preferred mode of travel through the halls of the hospital for our youngest patients.

rewards.name: Family Meal Card
rewards.description: Your donation could help provide a meal card for a St. Jude family for one week. St. Jude provides patients and their families with meal cards for breakfast, lunch and dinner in Kay Kafe, the hospital's cafeteria.

rewards.name: Share of Bone Marrow Treatment
rewards.description: Your donation could help cover a share of bone marrow treatment at St. Jude. The St. Jude Bone Marrow Transplantation Program is one of the largest pediatric programs in the world.

rewards.name: 2/3 Share of Chemotherapy Treatment
rewards.description: Your donation could help cover about two-thirds of the cost of one day of chemotherapy. Treatments invented at St. Jude have helped push the overall survival rate for childhood cancers from 20% when the hospital opened in 1962 to more than 80% today.

description:
I'm fundraising for St. Jude Children's Research Hospital! For each dollar donated, you have a chance to win one of the prizes. Prizes available include: 
- 5 Quokka JS VSCode plugin licenses ($55 value)
- 5 Wallaby JS VSCode plugin licenses ($135 value)
- 4 two-year CloudCannon Team plans! ($6000 value)
- License to my Astro course!

Donating does not guarantee one of these items. Each dollar you donate will earn you one “raffle” ticket. Winners will be announced at the end of the campaign.
